Articles.Content: My Parachutes act as if there no even deployed but they are fully deployed. Is there some mod i need to fix this or tinker some code or something?

Try deleting the PartDatabase.cfg and see if that helps. You'll need to restart KSP.

If not, please provide a little more info, such as a picture of your craft. And if you are using any add-ons, make sure they've been updated for 1.0.5.

Cheers,

~Claw
